patterns: What time is the welcome speech happening?
When does the welcome speech take place?
What is the timing for the welcome speech?
responses: The Welcome Speech is scheduled for 16 January 2025, from 07:00 PM to 08:30 PM.

patterns: Where will the welcome speech be held?
What is the venue for the welcome speech?
Can you tell me where the event is?
responses: The Welcome Speech will take place at Block C, James Cook University Singapore.

patterns: Who are the speakers at the welcome speech?
Can you tell me who will be speaking at the welcome speech?
Who will be presenting the welcome speech?
responses: The Welcome Speech will be presented by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor of Singapore, and the Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement.

patterns: What is the schedule for the welcome speech event?
Can you share the timeline for the welcome speech?
What is the detailed schedule for the welcome speech?
responses:
The Welcome Speech Schedule is as follows:
07:00 PM – 07:10 PM: Welcome Speech by the Deputy Vice-Chancellor of Singapore
07:10 PM – 07:20 PM: Welcome Speech by the Acting Campus Dean & Head of Learning, Teaching & Student Engagement
07:20 PM – 07:25 PM: JCU 101
Proceed to Breakout Rooms

patterns: What time is the Academic Briefing scheduled for?
Can you tell me the time for academic advising?
When does the academic session start?
responses: The Academic Briefing will take place on 16 January 2025, from 07:25 PM to 08:30 PM.

patterns: Who is conducting the Academic Advising session?
Who will be leading the Academic Briefing?
Who are the instructors for the academic session?
responses:
The Academic Briefing will be led by:
- Associate Professor, Counselling
- Academic Head, Social and Health Sciences
- Academic Head, Business

patterns: Which courses are available for the Welcome Speech?
What programs are eligible for the Welcome Speech?
What courses can I join for the event?
responses:
The eligible courses for the Welcome Speech are:
- Part-Time Diploma of Higher Education (Psychological Science)
- Part-Time Bachelor of Psychological Science
- Part-Time Master of Guidance and Counselling
- Part-Time Business Programs
